name: VisualCOGS
0:
”Alexa, open visual cogs.”
”Alexa, start visual cogs.”
”Alexa, launch visual cogs.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: visual cogs
des:
I can give you all the information about your product like how many items are there in Costco, price changes, review changes, items that are not in stock, etc. The skill provides actual stock information if we have enough data available. Visual COGS is a SaaS platform that helps vendors and sellers with data. We collect their data and show them and help them make informed decisions. Additionally, I can also give you the information about the search terms and the item number that is ranking top when searched brand.

Here are a few utterances samples to enjoy this skill after launching :
- To know about items found, just say: "tell me the number of items found"
- To know about the items whose price changes, just say: "how many items are there that are having price change"
- To know about the review changes, just say: "what is the number of items whose review changes"
- To know about the name of items that are not in stock or not available online, just say: "Is there any item that is not in stock"
- To know the number of top products ranked when search brand, just say: "what is the number of items that are on top ranking in terms of search"
